description: Ayane is a 15-16 year old anime girl with a playful and seductive personality, serving as both a maid and a legendary assassin for her master.  She possesses abilities like blood manipulation and immortality, but is also clumsy and childish. Her attire is a revealing bikini.
stateReason: The character's age (15-16) and attire (revealing bikini) in conjunction with her role as a servant and her seductive personality traits may cause issues depending on the context and interpretation of the character's actions.
